articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on Monday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 I extend congratulations to you and the friendly people of the DPRK on behalf of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and on my own behalf on the occasion of the New Year 2014, an event of significance in the life of all people on our planet.
					
					 The relations of our two countries have all preconditions for the people of Russia and the DPRK to achieve new successes in the efforts for social progress in the New Year 2014.
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 I hope that all citizens of the DPRK will sit together with all their family members and relatives to greet and celebrate the holiday in peaceful family atmosphere in the New Year.
					
					 I wish you good health and happiness in the New Year.
					
					 Sincerely Yours.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Figures
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Monday on the occasions of the 2nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year, Juche103 (2014).
					 He was also presented with a floral basket by Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindallae Children's Foundation, on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 103 (2014).

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un 
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 103 (2014).
					 Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, and Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez conveyed them to DPRK Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Ui Chun on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the missions of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, the World Health Organization and the World Food Programme here laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche103 (2014).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute in deep reverence for the peerlessly great men who dedicated their lives to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people and made immortal contributions to defending the global peace and stability.

articles.title: Mosaic, Monument to Revolutionary Activities of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected
articles.content:
Mosaic, Monument to Revolutionary Activities of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected 
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A mosaic "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il who personally attended the ceremony of completing the construction of Chongchun Street" and a monument to their revolutionary activities were erected at the Sports Village in Chongchun Street here.
					 A ceremony of unveiling the mosaic and monument took place on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the WPK, officials in the field of sports, employees and sports persons.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the mosaic before paying tribute.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Ri Jong Mu made an address.
					
					 He said that the mosaic and the monument were erected at the Sports Village in Chongchun Street, a reflection of the steadfast will of all officials and employees in the field of sports and sportspersons to glorify forever the feats of the peerlessly great persons and dynamically advance to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called upon all officials, employees and sports persons to remain loyal to Kim Jong Un's leadership and devote themselves to the work to build the sports power of Juche.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants were briefed on the mosaic and the monument before looking round them.

articles.title: Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble gave a performance "Let's Support General Kim Jong Un with Arms" at the April 25 House of Culture on Monday to celebrate the second anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA. 
					 Among the audience were senior party and state officials including Kim Yong Nam and Pak Pong Ju, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and Pyongyangites and participants in the meeting of activists in fisheries of the KPA. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas Koreans staying here, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and military attaches and their wives here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful pieces including the overture "Let's Support Our Supreme Commander with Arms", mixed quartet and chorus "Our Dear Supreme Commander" and male tenor quartet "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party".
					
					 The performers extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un successfully carrying forward the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu and enthusiastically sang of the great excitement and joy of the service personnel and people of the DPRK blessed with the illustrious leaders and supreme commanders generation after generation. 
					
					 Mixed duet and chorus "Party's Flag, Always Together with You" impressively represented the strong will of the service personnel to be a dependable scout party and strong pillars for the Songun revolution. 
					
					 Female solo "Ardent Desire" reflecting the unanimous desire of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to uphold Kim Jong Un, the great sun of Songun, mesmerized the audience.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- All people across the country have significantly celebrated the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Performances were given by artistes of the national art organizations at theatres in Pyongyang.
					
					 At the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the Moranbong Theatre the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe and the National Symphony Orchestra put on the stages such colorful numbers as female sextet "We Can't Live without You" and orchestral music "We Will Follow You in One Mind".
					
					 Colorful acrobatic pieces were presented at the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the Pothonggang Circus Theatre, delighting visitors.
					
					 Colorful numbers were staged at the theatres across the country to rev up the festive mood.
					
					 Performers of art troupes in North Phyongan, Ryanggang, Kangwon and South Phyongan provinces sang high praises of the undying feats of Kim Jong Un, who has wisely led the Korean revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Put on the stages by the art troupes of North and South Hwanghae, Jagang and South Hamgyong provinces were chorus "Footstep", dance "Following Brilliant Commander of Mt. Paektu", mixed quintet and chorus "Ode to the Motherland" and other numbers.
					
					 There took place a dancing party of members of the women's union of Kaesong City at the gym of the Kaesong Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					 People and schoolchildren across the country held poem-reciting and singing events and oratorical meetings at which they renewed their resolution to devote themselves to translating into reality the noble ideal and desire of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country on Monday, the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Amid the playing of song "Our Leader Loved by People" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, Arch of Triumph and other places in Pyongyang youth and students started dancing, extending the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un, who is demonstrating all over the world the dignity and might of Songun Korea.
					
					 Dancing to the tune of songs "Footstep" and "Most Profound Is the Care of You", youth and students represented boundless reverence and thanks to the peerlessly brilliant Songun commander. 
					
					 "Fortune of Korea", "Our Socialism Is Best in World" and other songs resounded far and wide through the dancing places, representing joy of the young people being blessed with the illustrious leaders and the supreme commanders down through generations.
					
					 Also resounded in the dancing places were "Nilliri for Songun", "July 27 March" and other cheerful songs.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in all provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Doctorate Awarded to Teachers of Yanbian University of China
articles.content:
Doctorate Awarded to Teachers of Yanbian University of China
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK awarded doctorate of philosophy to Kim Un Song and Jo Hong Hui and doctorate of economics to Hwang Kum Hae. They are teachers of Yanbian University of China.
					 Kim Un Song and Jo Hong Hui made contributions to scientifically systematizing the development of philosophy of the Korean nation and its good traditional ethics and Hwang Kum Hae contributed to settling issues arising in economic cooperation in Northeast Asia.
					
					 There took place a ceremony to award doctorate at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday

articles.title: Signal Leap Forward Made in DPRK This Year
articles.content:
Signal Leap Forward Made in DPRK This Year
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK performed shining feats in the general offensive this year in building an economic power and highly civilized socialist country in hearty response to the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un and his patriotic calls.
					  All service personnel and people made a grand advance, ushering in the greatest heyday of construction.
					
					 Thanks to the heroic struggle of service personnel the ski resort on Masik Pass has successfully been built as world-class one in a short span of time.
					
					 The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum was successfully built in Pyongyang as a monumental edifice of the times. The Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery was constructed here and cemeteries of fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army were rebuilt or built across the country.
					
					 The soldier-builders constructed the Unha Scientists Street and apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University in a matter of several months. They were built at the highest level on the basis of formative art to the best convenience of settlers.
					
					 Many edifices have been built in a matter of 9 months to boast highly civilized socialism. They include the large-scale combined Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club, Ryugyong Dental Hospital, Okryu Children's Hospital, Munsu Recovery Center, Rungna People's Sports Park, Pyongyang International Football School and the Rungna 4-D Simulation Cinema.
					
					 Parks, recreation grounds and rest places have been built in Pyongyang and all provincial seats and an epochal turn has taken place in city management as evidenced by signal successes made in creating greenery and turf of new species.
					
					 The new speed of advance has put spurs to the drive to put the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis.
					
					 The vitamin C production base was commissioned. It is equipped with the latest production process by biological engineering method.
					
					 A velvet shop was built at the Pakchon Silk Mill and the knitting yarn production process appeared at the Hamhung Woolen Mill.
					
					The Hamhung Knitwear Factory was updated and the production process of the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory was reconstructed.
					
					 The Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory has emerged a modern factory and another model unit in which cultured practice was established in production and life at a high level.
					
					 Tens of thousands of hectares of pastures were reclaimed and adjusted, more than 2 000 hectares of land turned into grassland, at least 22 000 domestic animals have been secured and more than 300 buildings were constructed through the drive to reclaim the Sepho Tableland at the second "speed on Masik Pass" and the speed of the Sepho Tableland.
					
					 The Central Mushroom Research Institute appeared at the State Academy of Sciences and the construction of mushroom cultivation bases, profitable comprehensive stock-breeding bases and greenhouses has been pushed forward across the country and the project for expanding the capacity of the Kosan Fruit Farm has been carried out.
					
					 The construction of the dam of power station No. 2 and the project of surge tank were wound up at the construction site of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station. Manpho Yonha Power Station, Orangchon Power Station No. 2 and Chosan Youth Power Station No. 2 went operational.
					
					 The project for laying railways branching into the Soksong Coal Mine and that for putting railways on an electric track were finished. The completion of the project for rebuilding and repairing the railway tunnels between Manpho and Hyesan railway sections opened the prospect for completing the project for rebuilding and repairing the northern railways ahead of schedule.
					
					 A huge project for building the gas producer shop and high-temperature air-combustion heating furnace and other objects were wound up at the Kangson Steel Complex.
					
					 The huge construction of the zinc oxide production process and the project for the first-stage rebuilding of liquefying process were finished at the Tanchon Smeltery and the ferrosilicon production process was built at the Haeju Kumgang Youth Smeltery.
					
					 The Thaethan Taehung Mine was commissioned and the ore crushing shop of Dressing Plant No. 3 of the Komdok Mining Complex and Mine Lot No. 3 of the Puraesan Mine were updated.
					
					 The base for producing functional three-ply sheets for greenhouse of tens of millions of square meters per year was built at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, fuel pumping branch factory at the Huichon Precision Machine Plant, a cement factory with great prospect in the Sinwon area and the methanol production process established at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 A dynamic drive for production was waged to improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 The silk and cotton production rose up at the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, the Hamhung Silk Mill and other units, and workers of Pakchon, Nyongbyon, Anju, Tokchon and Phalwon waged a dynamic drive to carry out their plan for the production of polychromatic silk and tetron ramie cloth through the increased production.
					
					 The Pyongyang Foodstuff Complex and factories under the Pyongyang City Management Bureau of Food and Consumer Goods Industries produced tasty and nutrient foodstuffs. The yearly plan for gross industrial output value was honored till November 15, taking the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries as a whole.
					
					 Local industrial factories in Jagang Province, Hoeryong City, all provinces, cities and counties kept the production going at a high rate.
					
					 Achievements were also made in culture.
					
					 Fresh and dynamic performing activities of the Moranbong Band and performances given by the State Merited Chorus and the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble demonstrated the might of the steadily developing Songun culture and arts.
					
					 "Ode to the Motherland" and "Party Flag, Always with You" were produced, representing the trust of all service personnel and people in the party and country in the wake of the creation of songs "July 27 March", "Tell, Fireworks of War Victory", "Respects to Victors of Great Age" and "Holiday of Great War Victory" reflecting the spirit of the times.
					
					 "We Know You Only" and "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only" representing the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to follow Marshal Kim Jong Un with deep trust in him resounded far and wide across the country.
					
					 Talented artistes achieved successes in international concours and festivals one after another and DPRK acrobatic pieces won top prizes at the 14th Wuqiao International Acrobatics Festival and the 12th Grenoble International Circus Festival.
					
					 The supreme ideal of people and final victory of the great Paektusan nation are sure to be achieved when the will of the army and people of the DPRK to share destiny with the party to the last runs high on this land. This is the proud review of this year's struggle.

articles.title: DPRK Workers Denounce S. Korean Regime's Suppression of Trade Unions
articles.content:
DPRK Workers Denounce S. Korean Regime's Suppression of Trade Unions
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Workers across the country express towering resentment at the south Korean puppet regime for brutally suppressing the just struggle of south Korean railway workers and other people.
					 There took place meetings of the employees of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and the Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory on December 28 and 30 to denounce the south Korean puppet authorities for their brutal suppression of the trade unions and support the south Korean people in their struggle for democratic right, freedom and right to existence.
					
					 The December 27 statement of the spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea was read out to be followed by speeches at the meeting of the employees of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex.
					
					 Speakers recalled that the south Korea regime hurled thousands of policemen to commit outrage at the headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions and walked away more than a hundred persons, adding it is an inhuman act of those who fully revealed their true colors as reckless strangler of human rights and heinous fascist.
					
					 The employees of the Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory said the demand for the right to existence can never be an illegal and rash act, branding the fascist repression as serious violation of human rights, democracy and justice and an act of treachery.
					
					 Exploitation and oppression are bound to cause resistance, they said, calling upon the south Korean workers and other people to more dynamically rise up in the struggle for frustrating the repressive rule of the puppet regime.

articles.title: News Analyst on Banner for DPRK's Victorious Advance
articles.content:
News Analyst on Banner for DPRK's Victorious Advance
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- It has been two years after Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 In those days the army and people of the DPRK have cherished deep in their mind the truth that the ideas and cause of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always emerge victorious under the guidance of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un represents the strength of ever-victorious Songun (military-first) Korea and the eternal banner of victory.
					
					 He has energetically guided the Songun revolution to reliably defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation, displaying the dignity of Songun Korea.
					
					 When the United States and its followers intensified the anti-DPRK moves as never before, he held higher the banner of the Songun policy to defend the country, revolution and socialism from their challenges.
					
					 From the outset of this year, he has made a ceaseless journey of field guidance to encourage the army and people to increase the combat capabilities of the KPA in every way and bring about eye-catching events throughout the country.
					
					 He inspected many frontline military units, including islet defence detachments and posts on Mt. Osong, leading the KPA to creditably discharge its mission and duty as a reliable scout party, an unshakable support for the Songun revolution, and indicating the Juche-based splendid strategy and tactics.
					
					 Today the KPA has turned into ranks of genuine comrades-in-arms, rallied as one in idea and mind around the supreme commander, an army strong in faith and will. All its servicepersons have grown to be dependable core forces with distinguished strategy and tactics and actual war capacity, fully ready for the final life-and-death battle with the enemy.
					
					 The military strength of the KPA reached a high level with its unique strategy and tactics.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK, united in mind around Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, have radically changed the looks of the country by speeding up the building of a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 Such monumental edifices appeared one after another as the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Unha Scientist Street, apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, Munsu Water Park, ski resort on Masik Pass, Mirim Riding Club, Okryu Children's Hospital and Ryugyong Dental Hospital.
					
					 Hundreds of pleasure parks and recreation grounds were built across the country to renew the looks of the country. 
					
					 All those achievements in the DPRK are a result of the seasoned guidance of Kim Jong Un and the patriotic efforts and loyalty of servicepersons and civilians rallied close around him. 
					
					 A rosy future is in store for the DPRK led by him.

articles.title: Papers Praise Kim Jong Un's Exploits Performed for Country and Its People
articles.content:
Papers Praise Kim Jong Un's Exploits Performed for Country and Its People 
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Monday editorially mark the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA). 
					 They say that Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA on Dec. 30, 2011 marked a historic event of great significance for developing the Korean revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Thanks to this event the tradition of victory of the country and the revolution has been given a steady continuity and it was possible to usher in the era of the grandiose struggle and changes for making a new history of Songun Korea with the might of the armed forces of Mt. Paektu, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Under his leadership the KPA has developed into elite powerful revolutionary army in politico-ideological, strategic and tactical aspects and in terms of military technology, the whole country has grown as strong as an invulnerable fortress and signal victory to be specially recorded in the history of the nation has been achieved in the stand-off with the U.S. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally planted trees together with service personnel, instilling Kim Jong Il's patriotism into them, and visited forefront posts very close to the enemies' posts, imbuing them with matchless strength and courage. Thanks to his energetic leadership the KPA has developed into the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army. 
					
					 He saw to it that a cemetery of the navy men who died heroic deaths while performing their combat duties was built to hand down their feats down through generations, an event unprecedented in history. He personally became the owner of the cemetery to make sure that they enjoy immortality. This is the acme of the love for the revolutionary comrades-in-arms, revolutionary comradeship which will always go down in the history of Juche-oriented army building. 
					
					 He assigned to service personnel of the KPA tasks for building grand monumental edifices and reposed in them such deep trust as helping them usher in greatest heyday of construction in the "speed on Masik Pass". 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the two years in which the army and people of the DPRK have worked, having Kim Jong Un as the supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces, are a period of victory and glory during which the exploits performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the army-building have been firmly preserved and the might of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army has grown remarkably.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Wicked Design Lurking behind Its Fiction about North's "Provocation" Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Wicked Design Lurking behind Its Fiction about North's "Provocation" Disclosed 
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive recently visited a forefront post of the south Korean puppet army for the first time since she took office.
					 There she cried out for "taking a strong and firm counteraction in case of provocation from the north," jabbering "there is great likelihood of its provocation."
					
					 Earlier, she underscored the need to strengthen an alert posture at a meeting of ministers of foreign affairs and security and that of chief secretaries of Chongwadae, saying that "the security situation remains serious" and "there is no knowing about when the north would provoke."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a clumsy charade for diverting elsewhere the attention focused on the south Korean authorities and getting rid of their crisis.
					
					 What matters is that the reckless acts of the south Korean warmongers are likely to lead to a war against the north.
					
					 It is by no means mere hypothesis that the south Korean regime finding itself in a pitfall of destruction may ignite the war as its last resort.
					
					 However, there is something to warn the south Korean warmongers against.
					
					 They should not forget the bitter lesson taught by the Yonphong Island shelling incident in which they were hit hard by the merciless retaliatory action taken by the KPA against their firing of a few shells at it under the pretext of "coping with the provocation."
					
					 Should the enemies fire even a single shell into the north's waters, the service personnel and people of the DPRK will take it as a golden opportunity to launch a sacred war for national reunification and wipe out the provocateurs to the last one.
					
					 The puppet regime should bear in mind what dear price it will have to pay for any provocation and behave itself.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown on Workers under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown on Workers under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities, keen on suppressing the strike of the Railway Trade Union, forcibly searched the headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions a few days ago to arrest core members of the union. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary terms this a shuddering act of revealing the fascist and unpopular nature of the conservative regime.
					
					 The regime even insulted the struggle of the railway workers against the privatization of the railway service as an effort for "meeting their own interests", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 This is an intolerable mockery of the people desirous of defending the right to existence.
					
					 The barbarous suppression brought to light again the unpopular nature of the present ruling forces bent on maintenance of power while reigning over the people and resorting to dictatorship and repressive policy.
					
					 The day after the police search of the headquarters of the confederation ended in failure, the puppet chief executive at a meeting of chief secretaries cried out for "abiding by principle in taking strong counteraction" against the strike of railway workers. This is not just a reprisal act. Lurking behind this is the sinister intention to thwart the workers' struggle against the conservative authorities and quench the anti-"government" spirit mounting throughout south Korea.
					
					 If the present situation is connived at, the south Koreans' struggle for democracy and right to existence will be totally checked and it will become difficult for them to save even their own lives in the face of the arbitrary practices of the dictatorial forces.
					
					 The right to existence can be won only through unflinching struggle.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Sophism Intended to Realize Its Ambition for Reinvasion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Sophism Intended to Realize Its Ambition for Reinvasion
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government decided on new "defence programme guidelines" recently, claiming that the DPRK is a "major factor of instability for the region and the international community".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but cunning sophism to divert elsewhere international attention and caution focused on Japan, which is getting further militarized and lurching to the Right, and realize its ambition for reinvasion at any cost. 
					
					 The Japanese government is playing a petty trick to draw to the DPRK the world's caution and concern riveted on it.
					
					 The Japanese reactionary ruling forces' criminal moves to turn Japan into a major military power and launch reinvasion with such amateur ploy would get them nowhere.
					
					 As proved by the facts, Japan is a true factor of instability as it is making desperate efforts to hide its past crimes and realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 Japan is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can evade its responsibility for its past crimes by overriding its neighboring countries and reinvading them by turning itself into a major military power.
					
					 The present times are quite different from the latter half of the 19th century and the first half of the 20th century.
					
					 Japan should never expect such international environment where it could go reckless with aggression and plunder just as it did in the past era.
					
					 Japan is making desperate efforts to pull back the chariot of advancing history but it is in vain.
					
					 The Japanese government should clearly understand that all wrongs it is now doing is nothing but an adventurous gambling on which it stakes its fate.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms Japan's New Strategy for National Security One for Reinvasion
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms Japan's New Strategy for National Security One for Reinvasion
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Japan recently announced a new strategy for national security aimed at overseas militarist aggression. The Japanese reactionaries seek to fling open the gate to a military giant with the help of the strategy, says Minju Joson Monday in a commentary.
					 Japan claimed the "dominium over Tok Islets" even in a document outlining the national security strategy. It is to justify the policy for overseas militarist invasion under the pretext of "defense" and "security" and realize the ambition for overseas expansion at any cost, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese government's "claim to Tok Islets" is a prelude to reinvasion of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Japan is aggravating the regional situation, an indication that the Japanese reactionaries are the dangerous militarist aggression forces wrecking peace and security in Asia.
					
					 The danger of war rapidly increasing in Northeast Asia is casting a dark shadow on the world peace and security.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better be prudent, mindful that their mistaken provocation for reinvasion will lead them to a final ruin.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Harasser of Regional Peace
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Harasser of Regional Peace
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The deputy spokesperson for the U.S. State Department recently accused the DPRK of "spending money for the unnecessary munitions sector" and "hindering the efforts for peace and stability in Northeast Asia". The White House spokesperson also charged that the DPRK has failed to observe its commitments for the international community, seeking arms buildup.
					 The remarks remind one of a thief crying "Stop thief!"
					
					 It is a universally recognized fact that the military spending of the U.S. accounts for 40 percent of the world's total military expenditure, much higher than that of 10 major powers.
					
					 According to a report issued by a Chinese strategy institute in July, the U.S. has decreased its total military budget for its financial crisis, but the key military budget has witnessed an increase of 80 percent over that of 2001. The present military budget made public by the U.S. does not include such hidden expenditures as spending for nuclear management and defence activities.
					
					 Then, the question is why the U.S. is clinging to such sophism, though it squanders an exorbitant amount of money on arms buildup including modernization of nukes and war maneuvers.
					
					 In fact, the U.S. military buildup is now targeting Asia, as evidenced by the remark of the secretary of Defence at a House of Representatives Armed Security Committee hearing in April that the military budget for the next year chiefly aims at dealing with Asian regional problems.
					
					 The Asia-Pacific strategy and maneuvers pursued by the U.S. in recent years have become the source of wrecking regional peace and stability and disturbing the efforts for them. The mastermind of all wars and disputes that occurred in the region after World War II was none other than the U.S.
					
					 In Asia, the U.S. might be seen as the Savior to a handful of its stooges, but it is a gate-crasher and a trouble-maker to those countries aspiring after independent development. But for the U.S. interference, the region would have made greater strides in more stable circumstances.
					
					 The U.S., which has poured astronomical military expenditures to sow unrest and discord in different parts of the region, has no face to say this or that about others.
					
					 Only the self-defence capabilities serve as a powerful treasured sword for defending each country and nation, as long as there remains the U.S., the main policy of which is military aggression and interference.
					
					 They are absolutely needed for the DPRK, which is technically at war with the U.S. The DPRK's increased defence capabilities greatly contribute to ensuring military balance on the Korean Peninsula and serve as a strong deterrent to not only the U.S. moves for stifling it but also any attempt to destroy the regional stability.
					
					 What are really unneeded for the DPRK is just the U.S. hostile policy and the interference and war moves pursuant to it. The same goes to the regional issues.
					
					 It would be better for the U.S., a gate-crasher to Asia, to go back, though belatedly, and mind its own business.

articles.title: S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Stages General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Stages General Strike
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions staged a general strike on December 28 in solidarity with the struggle of the railway trade union, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 Prior to the strike, the organization held a rally at Seoul Plaza with a hundred thousand of unionists attending.
					
					 Speakers at the rally denounced the regime for resorting to such brutal fascist crackdown as storming into the headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions, etc. far from negotiating with the railroad trade union.
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions declared that it would break off all relations with the "government" from that day and launch its first round of general strike for checking the privatization.
					
					 Meanwhile, civic and labor organizations including the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Teachers Union held meetings in various parts of Seoul in strong protest against the authorities' privatization of railway service.

articles.title: Crackdown on Progressive Media Criticized
articles.content:
Crackdown on Progressive Media Criticized
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an editorial on Dec. 27 denouncing the puppet authorities' suppression of progressive media.
					 Now ringing out from the south Korean public are voices critical of the present authorities' attitude to the media that has reached the worst phase.
					
					 During the "presidential" election campaign the chief executive promised to reinstate media-persons who were dismissed under the Lee Myung Bak rule for demanding impartiality of media, but she has not kept her promise as yet, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 The police stormed the building of Kyunghyang Daily News causing chaos and preventing the issuance of newspapers. The ruling political party took the lead in taking tough disciplinary measures against media which did not side with the authorities' racket of eliminating the "forces following the north".
					
					 The regime even let a person who was dismissed from office as a lawmaker for illegal act hold a post in charge of the media activities, the paper disclosed, querying how can such a regime cry out for impartiality of media.
					
					 To slight progressive media is little short of confessing that it is not a democratic government, the paper stressed

articles.title: S. Korean People's Struggle Supported by Koreans in China
articles.content:
S. Korean People's Struggle Supported by Koreans in China 
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China on Dec. 28 issued a statement titled "We fully support the struggle of the south Korean people who dynamically fight for the justice and truth".
					 The statement expressed the towering hatred against the puppet conservative group, the descendant of "yusin" dictatorship, which mercilessly suppressed the workers by hurling the police.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The bestial and bloody crackdown on empty-handed workers is reminiscent of the mass killings committed by the military fascist gangsters in the past.
					
					 The statement said that if the south Koran people undauntedly wage such dynamic actions as the massive candlelight meeting, general strike and a million-strong meeting on the situation with their concerted efforts till they oust Park Geun Hye, they will win a victory without fail.
					
					 The Koreans in China will invariably and fully support the south Korean people in their actions for justice and truth together with all other compatriots, it stressed.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Commemorated Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars, remembrance meetings, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Russia, Mongolia, Bangladesh, India, Nepal, DR Congo, the UK, and Italy from Dec. 18 to 23 on the occasions of the second anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise, the 22nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA, and the 96th anniversary of birth of the anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were a photo of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Suk standing side by side, and photos documenting revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were famous works of the peerlessly great men, and books and photos introducing prospering Songun Korea.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films such as "Fireworks of a thriving nation" and "Reply of Korea."
					
					  The president of the Bangladesh People's League noted that the KPA became matchless revolutionary forces as it was led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Suk devoted her all to the country and its people to the last moments of her life from the day she embarked upon the road of revolution in her early days.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Journalists Forum in Nepal said that socialism in the DPRK has made victorious advance in the 21st century, too.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche idea of Kim Jong Il in DR Congo noted that the noble life of Kim Jong Suk would shine forever along with prospering Korea.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted in the event held in the U.K.
					
					 Meanwhile, round-table talks, a photo exhibition and film show were held in Cambodia, and a remembrance meeting and film show in Angola between Dec. 13 and 17 on the occasions of the 2nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise and the 2nd anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA.

articles.title: Russian Papers Commemorate Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Papers Commemorate Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise.
					 The Russian paper My Home-Sochi on Dec. 12 allotted one whole page to articles accompanied by photos of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un inspecting KPA units.
					
					 The article titled "Peerlessly Patriot General Kim Jong Il" said that the world lost the most outstanding, great man due to his untimely demise on Dec. 17, 2011.
					
					 It noted that the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as an all-powerful treasured sword for reliably defending the sovereignty of the country and nation.
					
					 The distinguished feats performed by him serve as an eternal engine to vigorously advance the cause of socialism of the Korean people.
					
					 The paper pointed to the fact that he opened a bright prospect for the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The 46th issue of the Russian paper Patriot and Komsomolskaya Pravda on Dec. 10 carried articles titled "Rays calling for dynamic advance" and "Snow and Kim Jong Il," praising the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun with his rare ideological and theoretical wisdom and outstanding leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by British Social Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by British Social Body
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on Dec. 16 posted on its website an article titled "Eternal Sun of Nation" illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise.
					 It said that it is none other than Kim Jong Il who ushered in the June 15 era of reunification to achieve independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 In this era, the reunification movement of Korea has developed into a nationwide one.
					
					 The compatriots in the south deeply realized the outstanding leadership quality of Kim Jong Il and his personality as a great man and were convinced that he was a prominent man the Korean nation should always follow and hold in high esteem. 
					
					 Publications of south Korea edited a lot of articles titled "Noble soul of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, the sun of the nation, would be always remembered by the people" and "General Kim Jong Il will be praised in human  history forever", giving wide publicity to the great feats of the father of the nation.
					
					 People from all walks of life highly praise the noble career of Kim Jong Il, who devoted his whole life to the country and nation.
					
					 South Korean people are expressing irrepressible resentment at the conservative regime, which pushed the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe and created the extreme danger of a war.
					
					 The Korean nation will hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of the nation for all ages and implement his last instructions without fail by weathering difficulties and trials under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus surely build a prosperous reunified power.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Anniversaries Observed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Anniversaries Observed in Bangladesh
						
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, made public a statement on Dec. 21 to mark the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the army and people of the DPRK on the 22nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA and the 2nd anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post.
					
					 Kim Jong Il paid primary attention to strengthening the KPA by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 The KPA has grown to be a reliable guardian of the socialist cause as it is under the command of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Firmly convinced that the army and people of the DPRK will register greater successes in building a thriving nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un, we extend solidarity to the DPRK's cause of Songun.

articles.title: Acto central por 2o aniversario de nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del EPC
articles.content:
Acto central por 2o aniversario de nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 2o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					A la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de organos, fabricas, empresas y los ameritados laborales en la capital y los activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un fue nombrado como Comandante Supremo del EPC segun el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y este evento historico tiene importancia decisiva en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, comenzo el informante y prosiguio:
					
					Kim Jong Un es otro general insigne del monte Paektu que establecio hace mucho tiempo profundas relaciones con el fusil y estuvo siempre junto con el Dirigente en el camino de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Asi realizo inmortales hazanas en la causa de construccion del ejercito.
					
					En dos anos de su direccion sobre la construccion del ejercito, estan registradas las huellas de noble fidelidad y obligacion moral del Mariscal que defiende y continua la original idea militar del Dirigente y sus hazanas por la construccion militar.
					
					Gracias a la dinamica direccion del Comandante Supremo, todos los comandantes y militares se armaron con las estrategias y la idea militar, las tacticas y los metodos de combate del PTC y crecieron como competentes operadores y combatientes que pueden cumplir plenamente cualquier mision de operacion y combate.
					
					Kim Jong Un es el gran maestro de creacion que con el poderio del Songun, crea milagros en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Al trazar el gran proyecto de construir en esta tierra un paraiso del pueblo que sea admirado por todo el mundo, el coloca siempre el EPC al frente en la campana para materializarlo.
					
					Debido a la destacada guia del Mariscal que hizo al EPC crear la "velocidad Masikryong" y conducir todo el pais a grandes saltos, se hizo realidad el proposito del partido de hacer del presente el ano de esplendor en la construccion.
					
					En la realidad maravillosa en que se levantan una tras otra en la tierra patria las creaciones monumentales, progresa con dinamismo la economia en general y se abre la epoca de florecimiento de la construccion de un Estado civilizado socialista, todos nosotros vemos la probada direccion del Mariscal que realiza los suenos de todos los militares y habitantes dando prioridad a las fuerzas armadas.
					
					A pesar de las maniobras anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles, toma auge en escala nacional la lucha por la reunificacion de la patria y crece cada dia mas la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana gracias a la politica de Songun y la independiente politica exterior del PTC.
					
					Habria siempre victorias y glorias en el futuro camino del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que cuentan con su Comandante Supremo.

articles.title: Tiene lugar presentacion del MINFAP sobre las nobles personalidades de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Tiene lugar presentacion del MINFAP sobre las nobles personalidades de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 2o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 28 la presentacion del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares (MINFAP) sobre sus nobles personalidades.
					A la ocasion asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam y otros funcionarios del MINFAP, los generales y oficiales del EPC.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que al ver el estandarte del Comandante Supremo, todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes se sienten convencidos de la victoria, y narraron las cualidades de gran hombre de ese general insigne del Songun.
					
					Enfatizaron que el Comandante Supremo es el mejor ejemplo de fidelidad que escribe la nueva pagina de realizacion de la causa de eternidad de lider.
					
					Senalaron que Kim Jong Un fortalecio el ejercito popular como fuerzas revolucionarias de flor y nata y conduce a la victoria la batalla de confrontacion con los enemigos.
					
					Refirieron que el es padre afectuoso para todos los soldados.
					
					Agregaron que el abre el periodo de prosperidad tomando el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il como fuerza motriz de la construccion de un Estado prospero y poniendo al frente de esta causa al ejercito.
					
					Subrayaron que el EPC defendera firmemente la causa revolucionaria del Songun enalteciendo al Mariscal como unico centro de unidad y direccion y apoyando fielmente su orientacion.

articles.title: CMC del PTC ofrece banquete en honor de activistas de rama pesquera del EPC
articles.content:
CMC del PTC ofrece banquete en honor de activistas de rama pesquera del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecio el dia 28 en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en honor de los  participantes en la reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares (MINFAP).
					
					Fueron invitados los participantes en la reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC.
					
					En la ocasion pronuncio el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El orador recordo el hecho de que bajo las grandiosas benevolencias del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, se ofrecio un banquete en el Restaurante Okryu.
					
					Dijo que el Comandante Supremo presto profunda atencion a la rama pesquera del EPC para suministrar muchos pescados a los militares y envio modernos barcos para que capturaran abundantes peces.
					
					Agrego que el Comandante Supremo, al felicitar todos los exitos logrados por los funcionarios y los pescadores de la rama pesquera del EPC, dispenso las inolvidables benevolencias.
					
					Reflejando la unanime alma de los participantes agradecio al Comandante Supremo que dio gran confianza y amor a los funcionarios y los pescadores.
					
					Hubo la funcion artistica de felicitacion de los empleados del restaurante.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico de EPC
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico de EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 2o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 30 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion de musica y danza del Conjunto Artistico del EPC "Respaldemos con las armas al General Kim Jong Un". 
					La vieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades de masas, el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los trabajadores capitalinos y los participantes en la reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC. 
					
					Fueron invitados el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los compatriotas de visita en la patria socialista, los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales y agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					En la escena iniciada con el prologo "Respaldemos con las armas a nuestro Comandante Supremo" se presentaron el cuarteto y coro mixtos "Nuestro intimo Comandante Supremo", el cuarteto masculino "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo!", etc. 
					
					Los ejecutantes dedicaron las mas calidas felicitaciones al Mariscal quien lleva adelante la causa revolucionaria del Songun del Juche iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu y describieron el gran jubilo del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que gozan de generacion en generacion de la fortuna de tener a los grandes lideres. 
					
					El duo y coro mixtos "Siempre con la bandera del partido" demostro la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los oficiales y soldados del EPC de hacerse vanguardistas y baluarte de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					El solo femenino "Ardiente deseo", que refleja el unanime alma de todos los militares y civiles de apoyar bien al Mariscal, gran General del Songun, impresiono mucho a los espectadores.

articles.title: Celebran en Corea 2o aniversario de nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo
articles.content:
Celebran en Corea 2o aniversario de nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo
						
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los habitantes de todo el pais celebraron significativamente el 2o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En los teatros capitalinos tuvieron lugar las funciones preparadas por las entidades artisticas centrales.
					
					La Banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional presentaron en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este y el Teatro Moranbong el sexteto femenino "No podemos vivir sin el", la musica orquestal "Seguiremos con la unica alma" y otras piezas de diferentes generos.
					
					En el Circo de Pyongyang y en el Circo Pothonggang se llevaron a la escena las piezas acrobaticas que multiplicaron la alegria de los trabajadores, jovenes y escolares.
					
					Los espectaculos de arte tuvieron lugar tambien en las localidades de la RPDC.
					
					Los conjuntos artisticos de las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte, de Ryanggang, de Kangwon y de Phyong-an del Sur elogiaron inmortales hazanas del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien condujo sabiamente las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					En el repertorio de los conjuntos artisticos de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur, Hwanghae del Norte, Jagang y Hamgyong del Sur estuvieron el coro "Pasos", la danza "Siguiendo al General Insigne del Paektu", el quinteto mixto y coro "Himno a la Patria" y otras piezas.
					
					En el gimnasio del Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Kaesong tuvo lugar el baile de las gremiales de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en esa ciudad.
					
					Los trabajadores, jovenes y escolares de todo el pais expresaron en los recitales de poesia, cancion y oratoria la decision de contribuir al cumplimiento del noble ideal y deseos de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il uniendose firmemente en torno al Mariscal.

articles.title: Efectuados bailes de jovenes y estudiantes en ocasion de 30 de diciembre
articles.content:
Efectuados bailes de jovenes y estudiantes en ocasion de 30 de diciembre
						
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 2o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvieron lugar hoy los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes en diversas localidades.
					En las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang, el Arco de Triunfo, etc. se inicio el baile junto con la interpretacion de la cancion "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo".
					
					Los bailadores rindieron maxima gloria y calida felicitacion al Mariscal quien ostenta al mundo la dignidad de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Estremecieron las sedes de bailes las canciones "Fortuna de Corea" y "Nuestro socialismo es mejor en el mundo", que reflejan gran jubilo de los jovenes por contar de generacion en generacion con los grandes lideres.
					
					Las otras canciones tales como "Niliri del Songun", "Marcha del 27 de julio" y "Fiesta de la gran victoria en la Guerra" pusieron al climax el ambiente de bailes.
					
					Ese dia se efectuaron los actos similares en las cabeceras de las provincias, las ciudades y los distritos.
